projects.title: Svelte TodoMVC
projects.description: New implementation of [svelte-todomvc](https://github.com/sveltejs/svelte-todomvc) with TypeScript and CSS Flex Layout. Made from the project template [sveltejs/template](https://github.com/sveltejs/template).

projects.title: Deno Modules
projects.description: List of modules compatible with Deno from Github repositories tagged `deno`.

projects.title: Bouncing Balls
projects.description: My first simple game. Use the keys w, a, s, d to move the evil circle to eat the bouncing balls.
